scenario.name: Sipwise NGCP Benchmark UAC Caller
scenario.send: SUBSCRIBE sip:[field0 file="caller.csv"]@[field2 file="caller.csv"] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv"]@[field2 file="caller.csv"]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv"]@[field2 file="caller.csv"]> Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="callee.csv" line=0]%///[call_id] CSeq: 1 SUBSCRIBE Contact: sip:[field0 file="caller.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Call-Info: <sip:[field2 file="caller.csv"]>;appearance-index=1 Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 30 Event: line-seize Content-Length: [len]

ACK sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=0]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 [last_Via:] From: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv"]@[field2 file="caller.csv"]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=0]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="callee.csv" line=0]%///[call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: sip:[field0 file="caller.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: [len]

SUBSCRIBE sip:[field0 file="caller.csv"]@[field2 file="caller.csv"] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv"]@[field2 file="caller.csv"]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv"]@[field2 file="caller.csv"]> Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="callee.csv" line=0]%///[call_id] CSeq: 2 SUBSCRIBE Contact: sip:[field0 file="caller.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Call-Info: <sip:[field2 file="caller.csv"]>;appearance-index=1 [field1 file="caller.csv"] Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 30 Event: line-seize Content-Length: [len]

ACK [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv"]@[field2 file="caller.csv"]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=0]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="callee.csv" line=0]%///[call_id] [routes] CSeq: 2 ACK Contact: sip:[field0 file="caller.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
